channel.title: A question about - i think it's called - interface!
channel.description: How can i get a screen with text on it when i press Read on something? The same screen when u press ::commands. I think it's called an interface.

item.title: A question about - i think it's called - interface!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

=/. But i found an other way. Sadly not when i press read, but when i press a command. I called the command: “::admiralpiemakingguide”. Lol. Guide on how to make an admiral pie :P.

Read full topic

item.title: A question about - i think it's called - interface!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Almost. It isn’t that i dont want the command popping up. I want the same thing that pop-ups when i press ::command, - so that screen with all the commands on it - but with another text AND when i press read on an item.
